Nova Gorica.title: Nova Gorica
Nova Gorica.byline: Nova Gorica is a town in Slovenia on the Italian border.

Nova Iguaçu.title: Nova Iguaçu
Nova Iguaçu.byline: Nova Iguaçu is a city in Baixada Fluminense, in the metro area of Rio de Janeiro, state of Rio de Janeiro.

Novalja.title: Novalja
Novalja.byline: Novalja is a city on the island of Pag.

Novara di Sicilia.title: Novara di Sicilia
Novara di Sicilia.byline: Novara di Sicilia is a town in the Province of Messina in the Sicily region of Italy.

Nova Scotia.title: Nova Scotia
Nova Scotia.byline: Nova Scotia is one of Canada's Atlantic Provinces.

Novato.title: Novato
Novato.byline: Novato is a sprawling suburb in Marin County in the San Francisco Bay Area of California.

Nové Hrady.title: Nové Hrady
Nové Hrady.byline: Nové Hrady (German: Gratzen) is a small town in South Bohemia, Czech Republic on borders with Austria.

Nové Město pod Smrkem.title: Nové Město pod Smrkem
Nové Město pod Smrkem.byline: Nové Město pod Smrkem is a city in North Bohemia.

Novgorod.title: Novgorod
Novgorod.byline: Novgorod (Russian: Великий Новгород Velikii Novgorod) is one of the oldest cities in Russia.

Novi.title: Novi
Novi.byline: Novi is a city in Southeast Michigan.

Novi Sad.title: Novi Sad
Novi Sad.byline: Novi Sad (Serbian: Нови Сад/Novi Sad) is the capital of Vojvodina, the northern Autonomous Province of Serbia, and the second largest city in Serbia.

Novokuznetsk.title: Novokuznetsk
Novokuznetsk.byline: Novokuznetsk (Russian: Новокузне́цк nuh-vuh-kooz-NYETSK) is a big metallurgy and coal city in the south of Kemerovo Oblast.

Novorossiysk.title: Novorossiysk
Novorossiysk.byline: Novorossiysk is a port city in Krasnodar Krai with population 230,000.

Novosedly na Moravě.title: Novosedly na Moravě
Novosedly na Moravě.byline: Novosedly na Moravě is a small town in the Moravian wine region of the Czech Republic, where you can take an amazing trip on horseback through the vineyards.

Novosibirsk.title: Novosibirsk
Novosibirsk.byline: Novosibirsk (Russian: Новосиби́рск nuh-vuh-see-BEERSK) is a city of 1.6 million people (2018) in Novosibirsk Oblast, Siberia.

Novosibirsk Oblast.title: Novosibirsk Oblast
Novosibirsk Oblast.byline: Novosibirsk Oblast (Russian: Новосиби́рская о́бласть nuh-vuh-see-BEER-skuh-yuh OH-blust') is a region in Western Siberia, which borders Kazakhstan to the southwest, Omsk Oblast to the west, Tomsk Oblast to the north, Kemerovo Oblast to the east, and Altai Krai to the south.

Nova Petrópolis.title: Nova Petrópolis
Nova Petrópolis.byline: Nova Petrópolis is a small historic and tourist town in the Brazilian state of Rio Grande do Sul.

Novafeltria.title: Novafeltria
Novafeltria.byline: Novafeltria is in Emilia-Romagna, in Rimini province.

Novi Pazar.title: Novi Pazar
Novi Pazar.byline: Novi Pazar is a city of 100,000 people (2011) in Podrinje.

Novo Selo.title: Novo Selo
Novo Selo.byline: Novo Selo (Macedonian: Ново Село) is a municipality in the very southeastern corner of North Macedonia, bordering Bulgaria to the east and Greece to the south.

Novohrad.title: Novohrad
Novohrad.byline: Novohrad is a region in Central Slovakia, situated around the Ipeľ river (hence the alternative name Poiplie).

Novo Brdo.title: Novo Brdo
Novo Brdo.byline: Novo Brdo is a town in the Gjilani district of eastern Kosovo.
